member.name: XINPUT_VIBRATION
member.summary: Specifies motor speed levels for the vibration function of a controller.

member.name: XINPUT_VIBRATION.wLeftMotorSpeed
member.summary: Speed of the left motor. Valid values are in the range 0 to 65,535. Zero signifies no motor use; 65,535 signifies 100 percent motor use.

member.name: XINPUT_VIBRATION.wRightMotorSpeed
member.summary: Speed of the right motor. Valid values are in the range 0 to 65,535. Zero signifies no motor use; 65,535 signifies 100 percent motor use.
